description:
The daughter of the country`s Prime Minister, she has been bullied since childhood over her hair and eye color, being branded as something evil or cursed. Catarina Claes befriends her not long after she regains her past life memories and they become close friends through their shared love of romance novels.
It is revealed in season 1, episode 11 that she is also reincarnated. In her past life, she was Sasaki Atsuko, Catarina`s past life best friend, who wished to be reborn as Catarina`s best friend once again.
name: Sophia Ascart
